summary: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.
cast: Steve Blum|Dee Bradley Baker|Max Mitchell|Ben Kingsley|Jared Harris|Nick Frost|Richard Ayoade|Tracy Morgan|Nika Futterman|Pat Fraley|Fred Tatasciore|Isaac Hempstead Wright|Elle Fanning|Maurice LaMarche|James Urbaniak|Brian George|Toni Collette|Simon Pegg|Lori Tritel|Laraine Newman|Reckless Jack|Ron Bottitta|Tom Kenny|Sam Lavagnino|Julian Stone
title: Los Boxtrolls
